name: E Gaming Studios Inc.
description:
Help your digital friend design her new game. This was made for GDKO round 4. The challenge was to make a game with many customization choices.

  • Controls: WASD to move, Mouse (or arrow keys) to look around, Space to jump, P for pause/settings
  • Music: "Patagonia" by Scott Buckley, https://www.scottbuckley.com.au/, "Time" by ASHUTOSH-MUSIC from Pixabay, "Broadway Walk - Big Band Music" by JuliusH from Pixabay, "Without Limits" by Ross Bugden. Sounds effects are from mixkit.co.

If you want to learn more about the main character, you can play my GDKO Round 3 Entry.
